simple.description: Basic pass-through hook that logs prompts
simple.use_case: Starting point for custom hooks, debugging, or logging

wrapper.description: Wraps prompts with additional instructions or context
wrapper.use_case: Add systematic instructions, guidelines, or context to all prompts

validator.description: Validates prompts against rules before execution
validator.use_case: Enforce prompt standards, block inappropriate content, or require certain patterns

context-injector.description: Automatically injects contextual information into prompts
context-injector.use_case: Add project info, environment details, or external data to prompts

conditional.description: Routes prompts based on conditions to different behaviors
conditional.use_case: Apply different rules for different types of prompts or users
